document-snapshot-created-v2_documentSna.description: Document snapshot saved event message publisher

values.description: An array of entities to be stored in the Archive system

items.description: An array of entities to be stored in the Archive system

values.description: An array of entities to be stored in the Archive system

items.description: An array of entities to be stored in the Archive system

ChangeDocumentStateDto.title: ChangeDocumentStateDto

businessId.description: Business Id. This can be a Customer identifier from the Document, for example

ChangeDocumentStateDto.description: This event is used to change state of the Document

values.description: List of object IDs that Archive has archived and these objects can be safely deleted by the MS

items.description: List of object IDs that Archive has archived and these objects can be safely deleted by the MS

externalBusinessRulesTracing.description: Optional part of the response that contain payload provided by project via external business rules. NOTE: The section is always included to the response if provided, even for the case when OOB tracing is not requested (see 'businessRulesToTrace' query parameter description above).

Header-X-Request-Id.title: X-Request-Id
Header-X-Request-Id.description: Unique identifier of the execution process

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer that owns the entity

lastModificationDate.description: The date the entity was last modified (format - RFC 7493)

parentID.description: The unique identifier of parent entity (if defined)

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer that owns the entity

lastModificationDate.description: The date the entity was last modified (format - RFC 7493)

parentID.description: The unique identifier of parent entity (if defined)

value.description: Entity data in JSON format. Used for the small objects transfer scenario (<1-2 MB)

accepted.description: Flag indicates that the agreement item was accepted by the customer. Each change in the agreement should be accept by the customer

action.description: Agreement action defined by the Document content. Possible values are: ADD (a new agreement to be created as result of Document submission), DASH (no change to existing Agreement to be triggered on Document submission), MODIFY (modification of Agreement on Document submission), TERMINATE (termination of Agreement on Document submission)

agreementId.description: Id of the Agreement object from external master system.

associates.description: List of Customer Ids that are associated with corresponding Agreement with 'Associate' role.

expirationDate.description: The attributes holds information on when the agreement associated to exact Document Item is going to expire

agreementBaselineDate.description: A special Agreement related date that is used to define active Offerings, Discounts and priceKeys during Agreement consumption.

DeltaMessage:AgreementItem-1.description: Agreement reference. An agreement represents a contract or arrangement between the parties (e.g. between a service provider and a customer). An agreement involves a number of other business entities, such as products, services, and resources and/or their specifications
DeltaMessage:AgreementItem-1.title: AgreementItem-1

agreementType.description: Type of the Agreement: Master, Customer

externalAgreementId.description: Agreement Id from external master system

externalAgreementItemId.description: Agreement Item Id from external master system

DeltaMessage:AgreementItemRef.description: The entity represents reference to agreement item
DeltaMessage:AgreementItemRef.title: AgreementItemRef

alertLevel.description: Indicates the level of the Alert (e.g. Error, Warning, Info...)

alertType.description: Indicates the type of the Alert (e.g. Structure, Content, Financial, Eligibility, Concurrency...)

boundaryType.description: Shows boundaries of the overridden Price. Enum: More, Less.

offerId.description: Id of Product Offering associated with current alert item

priceType.description: Indicates the type of the Price

refId.description: Alert Item attribute: id of referred entity (e.g. Document Item Id)

refType.description: Alert Item attribute: type of referred entity (e.g. Document Item, Document)

DeltaMessage:AlertItem-1.description: An entity that represents a rule violation
DeltaMessage:AlertItem-1.title: AlertItem-1

invoiceTemplateName.description: Name of the template, that will be used for Payment Account creation

consentInfo.description: Represents necessary Consent data for anonymous Quotation process

templateName.description: Name of the template, that will be used for Customer creation

DeltaMessage:AnonymousCustomerData.description: Object that unites necessary Customer data for Anonymous Quotation process
DeltaMessage:AnonymousCustomerData.title: AnonymousCustomerData

timeSlotId.description: Id of a time slot from external system

DeltaMessage:AppointmentRef.description: Refers an appointment, such as a Customer presentation or internal meeting or location visit.
DeltaMessage:AppointmentRef.title: AppointmentRef

id.description: Id of an external bulk request for Product Instances modification

name.description: Name of an external bulk request for Product Instances modification

DeltaMessage:BatchRef.description: Reference to an external bulk request for Product Instances modification
DeltaMessage:BatchRef.title: BatchRef

currency.description: Code of currency (e.g. ISO 4217 code) of Payment Account

type.description: Type of the Payment Account Ref

DeltaMessage:PaymentAccountRef.description: PaymentAccount reference. A Payment Account is a detailed description of a bill structure
DeltaMessage:PaymentAccountRef.title: PaymentAccountRef

action.description: Action value for the Business Barring record (ADD, DASH, DISCONNECT)

businessBarringSpecificationId.description: Id of the referred Business Barring Specification.

expirationDate.description: The date reflects defined expiration date of the Business Barring Record. Note: this date may not match the date of the record removing

id.description: Unique Id of the Business Barring Record.

DeltaMessage:BusinessBarringRecord.description: This entity represents financial barring record
DeltaMessage:BusinessBarringRecord.title: BusinessBarringRecord

action.description: Action to be performed on this Business Group. Enum: ADD, MODIFY, DISCONNECT, DASH.

financialName.description: Financial Name of Business Group used in the Financial system

groupType.description: Type of a business group. The attribute is introduced for future use (not populated in Ehn6).

marketingBundleId.description: Id of a certain marketing bundle (POC entity)

subAction.description: Sub-action to be performed on this Business Group, e.g.: ROLLBACK. Attribute is used for in-flight Document.

DeltaMessage:BusinessGroup-1.description: An entity that represents a business group
DeltaMessage:BusinessGroup-1.title: BusinessGroup-1

consentSpecificationId.description: Unique identifier of the Consent Specification

consentState.description: State of the Consent(e.g. Granted, Rejected, Revoked)

DeltaMessage:ConsentInfo.description: Represents necessary Consent data for anonymous Quotation process
DeltaMessage:ConsentInfo.title: ConsentInfo

baseType.description: Generic attribute indicating the base class type of the extension class of the current object. Useful only when the class type of the current object is unknown to the implementation

emailAddress.description: Full email address in standard format

endDateTime.description: The time period that the contact medium is valid for - end date

faxNumber.description: The fax number of the contact

phoneNumber.description: The primary phone number of the contact

preferred.description: If true, indicates that is the preferred contact medium

preferredNotification.description: If true, indicates that ContactMedium is preferred as notification

schemaLocation.description: Generic attribute containing the link to the schema that defines the structure of the class type of the current object

startDateTime.description: The time period that the contact medium is valid for - start date

DeltaMessage:ContactMedium.description: Indicates the contact medium that could be used to contact
DeltaMessage:ContactMedium.title: ContactMedium

deliveryMethodId.description: Optional. Id of the Delivery Method (from the Delivery Method list).

DeltaMessage:DeliveryItem-1.description: The entity represents the delivery info.
DeltaMessage:DeliveryItem-1.title: DeliveryItem-1

created.description: true, if document was created in this delta

itemsAdd.description: document items which have been added

itemsDelete.description: document items which have been deleted

code.description: The attribute contains internal error code. Mandatory in response.

debugDetail.description: The attribute contains debug details (e.g. stack-trace). Presented in the error response only on Dev/Test environments if corresponding logging level is enabled.

extra.description: The attribute contains key-value map with dynamic fields of the message.

message.description: The attribute contains an error message.

originatingService.description: Contains abbreviation of service that produces error in shared business library.

reason.description: The attribute contains generic description of an error. Mandatory in response.

status.description: The attribute contains HTTP Status Code.

description.description: The attribute contains description of the invalid request parameter.

example.description: The attribute contains valid value example of the invalid request parameter.

parameter.description: The attribute contains information about the invalid request parameter.

pointer.description: The attribute contains information about the invalid entity in the request. Based on JsonPath format.

value.description: The attribute contains value of the invalid request parameter.

DeltaMessage:ErrorSource.description: The object contains information about the exact part of the request where the error has occurred.
DeltaMessage:ErrorSource.title: ErrorSource

DeltaMessage:ExternalRef.description: In case ExternalRef received with ExternalRef.refType = 'Product Order' from Document TMF Service - save/update the ExternalRef.refId to Document.salesOrderId, otherwise create identical ExternalRef object (ExternalRef.refId =ExternalRef.id, ExternalRef.refType = ExternalRef.type, ExternalRef.name = ExternalRef.name). Note! Only a single ExternalRef with ExternalRef.type = 'Product Order' is allowed.
DeltaMessage:ExternalRef.title: ExternalRef

action.description: Action to be performed on the Horizontal Link: ADD, DASH, DISCONNECT.

documentItemIdFrom.description: Id of the source Document Item from which the Horizontal Link originates

documentItemIdTo.description: Id of the target Document Item to which the Horizontal Link points

specificationId.description: Id of Horizontal Link Specification in Product Catalog

DeltaMessage:HorizontalLink-1.description: Entity which represents special type of connection between two Document Items which are not in the same hierarchy. Note: only root Document Items of the same Customer can be connected via Horizontal Link.
DeltaMessage:HorizontalLink-1.title: HorizontalLink-1

addressLine1.description: Parameter is used to capture a complete address data and is intended to hold a portion of the address

addressLine2.description: Parameter is used to capture a complete address data and is intended to hold a portion of the address

addressLine3.description: Parameter is used to capture a complete address data and is intended to hold a portion of the address

associatedLocationGroup.description: List of Location Group that includes current Location.

belongsToHousingAssociation.description: Flag indicating if the Location belongs to a Housing Association

city.description: City that the address is in

country.description: Country that the address is in

geoAddressId.description: Id of the address unit from AM.

ownedByHousingAssociation.description: Flag indicating if the Location is owned by a housing association (b2b customer)

postCode.description: Descriptor for a postal delivery area, used to speed and simplify the delivery of mail (also known as zipcode)

state.description: State that the address is in

updateMasterSystemData.description: The flag is used to highlight those Location Items that are supposed to be updated in the master system as part of Document submission procedure.

notificationCategory.description: Category of events which initiate notification (e.g. Payment Account Notifications)

DeltaMessage:NotificationPreference.description: Represents necessary Notification Preference data for anonymous Quotation process
DeltaMessage:NotificationPreference.title: NotificationPreference

action.description: Action to be performed on this Document Item. Enum: ADD, MODIFY, DISCONNECT, DASH,SUSPEND, RESUME

agreementItemIds.description: A list of agreementRefs (Agreement Item in Quotation Engine model) Ids

amount.description: Allows to sell multiple Offerings with the same configuration

appliedBusinessBarringId.description: Id of Business Barring which was applied when this product offering added in document.

appliedByBusinessRuleId.description: Id of Business Policy Rule (from Product Catalog) by which this document item was automatically added to document

baselineDocumentItem.description: Attribute is used to mark in-flight Document Item.

financialName.description: Financial Name of Product Offering used in the Financial system

businessBarringRecords.description: Associated with Product Item Business Barring Records

conditionSetId.description: Condition set Id value. Auto-populated only in Agreement related scenarios.

contractedDate.description: Date and TIme that used to freeze prices on this date (The system allows to freeze Price Value + version for the Product Instance in order to ignore versioning)

corrupted.description: TRUE when the Document item is corrupted

instanceAgreementExternalIds.description: A list of unique external identifiers of the Agreements on Product Instance

instancePaymentAccountId.description: Id of the Payment Account that is propagated from Product Instance during init procedure.

instanceBusinessGroupId.description: Id of the business group that is propagated from Product Instance during init procedure

instanceOfferId.description: Id of the Product from Catalog that is propogated from Product Instance during init procedure.

instancePlaceExternalId.description: Id of the Place from Location Management that is propogated from Product Instance during init procedure.

instanceSourceDocumentItemId.description: Id of the Document Item which was used as a source for Product Instance configuration that is propagated from Product Instance during init procedure.

instanceState.description: State that is propagated from Product Instance during init procedure

instanceVersion.description: Version of the Product Instance from Inventory

currency.description: Currency (ISO 4217 code) in which price of the Product Item shall be created. Filled via propagation from Document (for root Product Items) or from root Product Item (for child Product Items)

discoReason.description: Reason of disconnection of the Product

distributionChannelId.description: Id of the Distribution Channel provided within Document creation or Patch

fulfillmentState.description: Fulfillment state of Product Order Item, e.g.: ponrPassed, ponrNotPassed, completed. Attribute is used for in-flight Document.

logicalGroupItemId.description: Id of the logical group item

mandatoryForAgreement.description: Parameter used to override min cardinality of an Offering for Agreement.

marketingBundleComponentId.description: Unique identifier of a marketing bundle component automatically populated by the system from the Product Catalog

numberOfMonthsTillExpiration.description: Number of month between plannedDisconnectionDate and Agreement.complitionDate.endDate

offerId.description: Id of the Product from Catalog

originalContractEndDate.description: This date reflects the contract end date originally captured during initial sales process. The value does not propagate automatically and does not change in response to extensions or renewals of the contract.

overrideMode.description: Indicates which kind of price is overridable (GROSS or NET).

parentId.description: Id of parent item (It is top If empty)

plannedDisconnectionDate.description: Planned disconnection date that is calculated by Inventory service for temporal Product Instance, i.e. that represents Product Offering with duration. It is automatically populated by the system from Product Instance during init procedure.

prepaymentRequired.description: This flag indicates whether prepayment is required for this Product Item. Null value to be considered as False. Note: The payment is recorded on the Document (document.paymentId attribute).

pricePlanId.description: ID of Price Plan related to price of the Document Item

priceRecalculationDate.description: Alternative date that used for price definition (instead of Contracted date). Example, used for definition of Price Key for calculation Disconnection fee

prices.description: Map containing prices. The key is Price Specification Id

prohibitManualRemoval.description: Flag defines that a document item can't be removed manually from a document, because it was added to a document automatically by Business Policy Rule of 'AutoAppliedRequiresRule' or 'AutoAppliedRequiresRuleWithRemove' type.

quantity.description: Indicates the quantity of the Product to be documentd

requestedPricePlanId.description: ID of Price Plan related to the Document Item's price, which was selected by user. This Price Plan Id is used in Price-plan-first concept.

rootId.description: Id of the root (top) Product Item

salesDate.description: Date is used to freeze hierarchy and check saleability on this date.

sequenceNum.description: Sequence number of the product item

subAction.description: Sub-action to be performed on this Document Item, e.g.: ROLLBACK. Attribute is used for in-flight Document.

suspended.description: Flag that indicates whether a Document Item is regarded as suspended.

virtual.description: This flag indicates whether this Product Item is virtual (initied to the Document just for Business Rule calculation) or not. Such Product Item can be inited only via system rules. Null value to be considered as False.

approvalLevel.description: Level of approval for the Document. The system automatically calculates approval level - maximal value of approval level on the Document Items.

assignedUsers.description: List of Users, to whom the Document is assigned

autoAppliedReferences.description: Target to auto-applied offerings items, caused by auto-application rules. Map items: targetItem.id>relatedItem.id > IDs of causal rules. This Map can be filled by the system only.

bannedRuleIds.description: Maps top product items to the rule IDs, where the rule auto-applied offerings were removed manually. This Map can be filled by the system only.

baselineDocumentId.description: Unique identifier of baseline Document. Attribute is used for in-flight Document

cancellationReason.description: The reason (from a list of Cancellation Reasons) why the Document has been cancelled

cancellationReasonDescription.description: The reason (from the free text field) why the Document has been cancelled

contractedDate.description: Date and Time that used to freeze prices on this date (The system allows to freeze Price Value version for the Product Instance in order to ignore versioning)

corrupted.description: TRUE when the Document contains corrupted items

currency.description: Currency (ISO 4217 code) in which prices of Product Items added within the Document shall be created. Propagated to root Product Items

customerCategoryId.description: Id of the Customer Category. Note: Changing of Customer Category doesn't lead to price recalculation and eligibility check execution.

customerCommittedDate.description: The date provided by the service provider when the Document will be fulfilled

customerRequestedDate.description: The date when the customer requests the Document to be fulfilled

deliveryMethod.description: (Optional) Id of the Delivery Method (from the Delivery Method list) for Document

distributionChannelId.description: Id of the Distribution Channel provided within Document creation or Patch

effectiveDocumentComplitionDate.description: Date when the Document was fulfilled

expectedFullfilmentStartDate.description: The date when the customer expects fulfillment of the Document to be started

externalId.description: ID given by the consumer and only understandable by him (to facilitate his searches afterwards)

externalPaymentId.description: Attribute that holds Id of the payment taken from external system.

externalProjectState.description: State of the Project to which the Document belongs

initialBaselineDocumentId.description: Id of the Document when it is created in the system

initialDistributionChannelId.description: Id of the Distribution Channel used for Document creation

newAgreement.description: Flag that is used to specify 'newAgreement' quotation mode. This mode implies use of additional logic and a separate document state model.

overrideMode.description: Indicates which kind of price is editable (Gross or Net)

owner.description: Sales person that owns the Document and intends to receive incentives

paymentDate.description: Date when payment is made and Document moves to PAID state

paymentReceived.description: The flag indicates whether payment for this Document is received. Null value to be considered as False.

paymentRequired.description: The flag indicates whether payment is required for this Document. Null value to be considered as False.

ratesBound.description: If true, shows that rates are frozen (used for a Conversion Currency)

removedTopProductItems.description: List of top product items that were removed from the Document in case of In-flight

revision.description: Attribute is used to mark in-flight Document. Increased in case changes are done to the Document after submission

salesDate.description: Date is used to freeze hierarchy and check saleability on this date

stateChangeDate.description: Date and Time of the last Document State Change

stateChangeReason.description: The reason why the Document state has been changed

stateChangeReasonDescription.description: The reason (from the free text field) why the Document state has been changed

submittedWhen.description: Represents date and time of Document submitting.

suppressLocationEnrichment.description: The flag is used to suppress automatic calls to Location Management executed by the system in order to fetch additional data relevant to Location Items in the Document.

target.description: Parameter based on which the system provides the ability to test new Product Offerings and Promotions on production environment earlier these Product Offerings and Promotions will be saleable for end-customers

DeltaMessage:Document-1.description: Represents common information about a customer's request
DeltaMessage:Document-1.title: Document-1

action.description: Action to be performed on this Document Item. Enum: ADD, MODIFY, DISCONNECT, DASH,SUSPEND, RESUME

financialName.description: Financial Name of Product Offering used in the Financial system

corrupted.description: TRUE when the Document item is corrupted

instancePlaceExternalId.description: Id of the Place from Location Management that is propogated from Product Instance during init procedure.

instanceState.description: State that is propagated from Product Instance during init procedure

discoReason.description: Reason of disconnection of the Product

distributionChannelId.description: Id of the Distribution Channel provided within Document creation or Patch

parentId.description: Id of parent item (It is top If empty)

rootId.description: Id of the root (top) Product Item

endDate.description: End date for related party validity period

startDate.description: Start date for related party validity period

type.description: Indicates the (class) type of Related Party: 'Individual', 'Organization', 'PartyRole', 'Customer'

userOfService.description: Is used to show that Related Party is a user of service (the Individual use this product on their own or only manages). Can be empty.

DeltaMessage:RelatedPartyRef.description: The party which the product is related with
DeltaMessage:RelatedPartyRef.title: RelatedPartyRef

paymentAccountId.description: Id of the Payment Account that was associated with removed Product Item

creationDate.description: The date and time of record creation, i.e. the date of Product Items removing

customerId.description: Id of the Related Party with type = Customer that was associated with removed Product Item

locationId.description: External Id of the location that was associated with removed Product Item

offerId.description: Id of the Product Offering of the removed Product Item

documentId.description: Id of the Document from which Product Items were removed

DeltaMessage:RemovedTopProductItem.description: The entity holds the information about Top Product Item that was removed from the Document in case of In-flight
DeltaMessage:RemovedTopProductItem.title: RemovedTopProductItem

impersonatedUserId.description: Unique identifier of the impersonated User.

userRole.description: Role of the User within the Document (e.g. financial approver, technical approver etc)

DeltaMessage:UserData.description: Contains information about the user who updated/created the record. In case of X-User-Id and X-User-Name provided in the event header, userId and userName will be filled. In case of X-Service(M2M operations) provided in the event header, userName will be filled(userId remains empty).
DeltaMessage:UserData.title: UserData

ChangeDocumentStateDto.name: ChangeDocumentStateDto
ChangeDocumentStateDto.title: ChangeDocumentStateDto
ChangeDocumentStateDto.description: This event is used to change state of the Document
